memberdef.name: mnt_Export

detaileddescription.para: mnt_Export: The Mount proc export function, for all versions.
The MOUNT proc null function, for all versions.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] The export list to be return to the client.

detaileddescription.para: mnt_Export_Free: Frees the result structure allocated for mnt_Export.
Frees the result structure allocated for mnt_Dump.

briefdescription.para: MOUNTPROC_EXPORT for Mount protocol v1 and v3.
